# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.



add_library(scheme-indexes-bloom INTERFACE)
target_link_libraries(scheme-indexes-bloom INTERFACE
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  ydb-core-protos
  core-formats-arrow
)

add_global_library_for(scheme-indexes-bloom.global scheme-indexes-bloom)
target_link_libraries(scheme-indexes-bloom.global PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  ydb-core-protos
  core-formats-arrow
)
target_sources(scheme-indexes-bloom.global PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/tx/columnshard/engines/scheme/indexes/bloom/constructor.cpp
